titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on a certain chemical.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 9/12/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on ion exchange resin powder comprised of a copolymer of methacrylic acid cross-linked with divinylbenzene, in the potassium ionic form, dried to less than 10% moisture.
